definition: classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
to feel ashamed of one's inferiority (idiom)/to feel inferior

sentences.english: Coenosia is subordinated to Muscidae. So far, 91 species have been found in China.
sentences.chinese: 穢蠅屬隸屬於蠅科，迄今爲止我國已知91種。

sentences.english: Repentance is Dharma. Repentance is like water, it can wash away filth.
sentences.chinese: 懺就是法，懺譬如水，能夠洗滌垢穢。

sentences.english: The sewage in Jinshui River has been under effective control in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 金水河的穢水近兩年得到了有效的治理。

sentences.english: The faunistic distribution features of the known Conosia insects in China are discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 重點討論了我國穢蠅屬已知昆蟲的區系分佈特點。

sentences.english: Bind a focus Unholy Command to your main attack(s).
sentences.chinese: 給你主要攻擊技能綁個穢邪命令。

sentences.english: Fuyu people which integrated with Huimo and some Hans were the main part of the Five Bus of GaoGouli.
sentences.chinese: 高句麗五部以夫餘人爲主，融合了穢貊及部分漢族。

sentences.english: Now is the time to go deep into our minds to wash away afflictions and filth.
sentences.chinese: 現在應該要從內心深入，來洗除煩惱垢穢的時候。

definition: to slander/to defame/to speak ill of
to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
flowery writing/writing concerning love and sex
to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
prisoner of war/to capture/to take prisoner/(old) northern barbarian/slave
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
